query.statement:
MERGE INTO SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 A USING (SELECT CAST(#G_MANDT# AS VARCHAR(3)) AS MANDT, CAST(#HOGI# AS VARCHAR(24)) AS HOGI, CAST(#COD# AS VARCHAR(15)) AS COD FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 )B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.HOGI = #HOGI# AND CHARACTERISTIC = #COD# AND SEQ = #SEQ# WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET HOGI = #HOGI#, CHARACTERISTIC = #COD# , VALUE = #VALUE#, ERNAM = #G_USER_ID#, CR_DATE = HEX(CURRENT DATE), CR_TIME = HEX(CURRENT TIME) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
INSERT ( MANDT , HOGI , CHARACTERISTIC , SEQ , VBELN , POSNR , MOWBS , CUOBJ , VALUE , ERNAM , CR_DATE , CR_TIME , TP_STATUS , TP_DATE , TP_TIME , TP_NAME ) VALUES ( #G_MANDT# , #HOGI# , #COD# -- , (SELECT SAPHEE.FILLINZERO(CHAR(VALUE(INT(MAX(SEQ)),0) + 1),2) SEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 WHERE MANDT = --#G_MANDT# AND HOGI = #HOGI#) , #SEQ# , #VBELN# , #POSNR# , '' , '' , #VALUE# , #G_USER_ID# , HEX(CURRENT DATE) , HEX(CURRENT TIME) , '' , '' , '' , '' )
